content: here s a sweet little valentine something i m making for my knitting friends and i thought i d share it with you too who couldn t use just a little extra love in their knitting bag i used size 5 needles with worsted weight wool yarn totally optional loop will require a small crochet hook use a yarn needle to tuck in the ends you will need about 10 yards - but that is a very rough estimate sorry in my hurry i forgot to add this to the key psso - pass slip_stitch over mine turned out about 3 square change yarn/needle gauge or stitch/row repeats to make any size you like
